#include <iostream>
#include <algorithm>
#include <string>
#include <cstdio>
using namespace std;

long int power(int a,int b,int n)
{
    int x=1;
    while(b!=0)
    {
        x=x*a;
        x=x%n;
        b--;
    }
    return x;
}

int main() {
	int t,x,y,n,i;
	long int r;
	cin>>t;
	cin>>n;
	for(i=0;i<t;i++)
	{
	    cin>>x>>y;
	    r=power(x,y,n)%n;
	    cout<<r<<"\n";
	}
	return 0;
}
